examples: He's far too young to go on his own.
Es demasiado joven para ir solo.
She was much too big to be carried.
Era demasiado grande para ser cargada.
This is too large a helping for me/This helping is too large for me.
Esta ayuda es demasiado grande para mí / Esta ayuda es demasiado grande para mí.
Is it too much to ask for a little quiet?
¿Es demasiado pedir un poco de tranquilidad?
